content.prompt: The relationship between the first and second paragraphs is best characterized as

choices.label: a description of people followed by a narrative of their actions
the presentation of an argument followed by a rebuttal
the consideration of pro and con within a single course of action
the juxtaposition of two contrasting personality types

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
